name: Wizerker
description:
I started learning unity a couple of weeks ago and this is the first game that I actually make and finish. 

You basically are a wizard that shoots fireballs at enemies and have to go through a couple of rooms before fighting a boss.

Thing is, the more damage you take the more damage you deal, ending in a wizard rage when at one health that also increases your move speed.  I used a tileset I found here that was made by 0x72. 

Again, this is my first actual game ever released so know that thats why its a bit on the shorter side of things/
